head.title: Carole Horan | Wedding and Events Florist | Contact and About Me

meta.content: Carole Horan - Experienced freelance Wedding, Corporate and Special Events florist. Flower arrangements for all occasions. www.carolehoran.com
meta.name: Description

meta.content: Carole Horan, freelance florist, flower design, wedding flowers, bridal flowers, bridesmaids bouquets, button hole flower, flower girl baskets, church flower arrangements, Church Seat Ribbons, Pew ends, Presentation Bouquets, wedding floral theme, reception venue flowers, corporate flowers, office flowers, special events flowers, engagement flowers, confirmation flowers, birthday flowers, party flowers
meta.name: Keywords

ul.li: | home | weddings | corporate | special event | contact |

div.p: I am a freelance florist with over 21 years experience, working with flowers both home and abroad.
I use only the finest quality blooms and fresh foliage, which I personally source from the market.
I take great pride in providing a personal service for all my clients and attention to detail is very important to me. I will happily travel to any location for an event or wedding.
I am also experienced in providing floral demonstrations and have given weekly classes to the patients in St. Lukes Hospital, Dublin, for the past eight years.

td.p: If you have any questions or would like to know more about the services I provide, please contact...
